channel.title: Arduino IDE :: ESP3D Ecosystem
channel.description: Prepare the development environment Please download ide from https://www.arduino.cc/en/software Warning Please use the Legacy IDE (1.8.X), the Arduino IDE 2.X was not tested and wonâ€™t be supported Install the esp core according your target: ESP8266 Warning Please use the version 2.5.2 or 2.7.4 only! Do not use any version upper than 2.7.4 ESP32 Warning Please use the version 1.0.4 only! Do not use any version upper than 1.0.4, and only use ESP32 board, other ESP32 flavors(C2, S2, S3, etc) are not supported in this version.
